data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Heaven and Earth Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
From the lone Tibetan monk standing atop the misty mountain peak to the mysterious ninja racing across the village rooftops, the mystical element invoked by the melody of erhu is a true treat for the listener's ears.

Heaven and Earth, composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, features masterful compositions in collaboration with Otori Ayaka - a Niko (Chinese Erhu) player from Japan. With 12 BGM themes and 36 ME sounds, this audio bundle is a great addition to modern and classic fantasy games alike. Blending tradition with modern instrumentation, Heaven and Earth is a cinematic-quality experience that will enchant the developer and the player alike.

Features:

  • 12 BGM themes.
  • 36 ME themes.
  • Authentic instruments and original composition.
  • .OGG and .MP3 formats included.
  • Tested in and formatted for RPG Maker VX-Ace.

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
The Agency Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack

store.steampowered.com/app/653726/RPG_Maker_MV__Heaven_and_Earth_Music_Pack/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
